Trade/Device Name(s): Great Basin Stool Bacterial Pathogens Panel
Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal Microorganism Multiplex Nucleic Acid-Based Assay
Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Great Basin Stool Bacterial Pathogens Panel, a multiplexed PCR assay for detection of gastrointestinal bacterial pathogens using the PA500 Portrait Analyzer System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplex test for detection and identification of nucleic acids from Campylobacter (C. coli/C. jejuni), Salmonella, Shiga toxin 1 and 2, Escherichia coli serotype O157, and Shigella in stool specimens from symptomatic patients, performed on the Portrait Analyzer as an aid in diagnosing gastrointestinal infections.
